price: ߝߏ߫ ߤߌߣߊ ߟߊ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߊ߰ߡߎ߲ ߤߊ߲߯ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
